What is EdIntel?

EdIntel delivers a sovereign‑AI platform for educators, administrators, and districts. It combines neural‑sync coaching, custom avatar delegates, and a transparent token economy—all wrapped in a clinical, glass‑morphic UI.

Trusted by 500+ Districts•1.2M+ Neural Nodes Active•HIPAA & FERPA Sovereign

Capabilities

The Sovereign Suite

Neural Sync Engine

AI‑driven coaching that synchronizes educator intent with student cognition, reducing burnout by up to 40%.

Sovereign Token Economy

A flexible, pay‑as‑you‑go model that fuels high‑compute tasks while keeping budgets transparent.

AI Avatar Laboratory

Create custom educational delegates that draft IEPs, lesson plans, and policy briefs in seconds.

District‑Wide Insight Dashboard

Real‑time analytics across schools, districts, and state compliance, all visualized with glass‑morphic UI.
